item.title: Remote Gameplay Sucks
item.description: Well I had a plan, but things didn’t go quite how I expected. RDP was just way too rough to play Dead By Daylight. Luckily, Steam made a tool called Steam Link that you can install on a linux machine or mobile device. It allows you to run the games from your main computer, and see the games on your remote computer. You send your keyboard/mouse from the remote computer to the main computer to play the game.

item.title: Setting Windows Aside
item.description: I’ve been a Windows user most of my 34 years on this earth. It was a matter of what my parents had in the house growing up in the 90s. As someone who got into videogames at a young age, Windows was the only way to go at the time. I wasn’t interested in building anything or being super technical, and it never even crossed my mind that I could be “good at computers” to pay the bills.

item.description: Just testing to make sure this works.
